timestamp.description:
Timestamp is time when entity enters pbehavior.
Use pointer of CpsTime to unmarshal null and undefined to nil pointer instead of zero CpsTime.

failed_events.description: FailedEvents is an empty array left for compatibility with old handler

retry_events.description: RetryEvents is an empty array left for compatibility with old handler

disable_during_periods.description:
DisableDuringPeriods is an option that allows to disable the rule
when entity is in listed periods due pbehavior schedule.

is_active_status.description: IsActiveStatus represents if pbehavior is in action for current time.

exec.description: Execution contains id if instruction execution for instruction steps only.

events_count.description: EventsCount accumulates count of check events.
